/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, filled with cars and buses, is flanked by towering buildings on one side and lush green trees on the other, creating a stark contrast between the urban and natural elements. The sky above is a clear blue, adding to the vibrancy of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape.
